content: i love waffles cowl materials yarn two 2 skeins of the lemonade shop bulky colorway used good reads needles us 10 circular misc notions darning needle 2 stitch markers + waste yarn stitches k knit p purl pattern cast on 92 sts place stitch marker to keep beginning of round + be careful not to twist your cast on k2 p2 to end of round repeat 8 more rounds round 1-4 knit round 5-6 k2 p2 repeat rounds 1-6 seven more times knit 4 more rounds k2 p2 to end of round repeat 8 more rounds bind off in favorite stretchy bind off weave in ends + make another property of the lemonade shop pattern may not be sold
